conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway (visible wall height/thickness, angled view, multiple faces per wall, and ceiling removed). However, the produced 3D layout does not correspond to the 2D plan and appears to depict a different room program (e.g., a bedroom) not present in the 2D plan.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Scoring skipped due to automatic rejection condition (missing/incorrect rooms exceeding threshold).

geometric_accuracy.notes: Scoring skipped due to automatic rejection condition.

interior_elements.notes: Scoring skipped due to automatic rejection condition.

visual_clarity.notes: Scoring skipped due to automatic rejection condition.

detected_errors.description: More than 50% of the 2D plan's rooms/spaces are missing or replaced by different spaces in the 3D render (e.g., 2D shows kitchen/dining/living arrangement; 3D shows a bedroom-like space and different partitioning).
Major wall/partition geometry and adjacency relationships do not align with the 2D plan (central bathroom/stair/entrance configuration differs substantially).

summary: Despite being a true 3D cutaway, the 3D model does not faithfully transform the provided 2D floor plan and omits/changes most rooms.
